item.title: Monthly reflection - June 2020
item.description: A reflection on my June 2020 of what I have done and achieved.

item.title: How I went from a Retail Assistant at 17 to Landing a Developer Role at 19
item.description: My journey to a developer is an alternative path to the norm. I'm going to share my journey so far with you in detail and offer my advice to new developers.

item.title: Why to not support Internet Explorer
item.description: So you're thinking of supporting Internet Explorer? Don't.

item.title: Learning Neumorphic Design
item.description: The awesome design trend that never took off! What are the fundamentals to neumorphic design?

item.title: All Day Hey! 2020
item.description: All Day Hey 2020 was an online conference for front-end developers and designers and I thought it was fantastic and educational!

item.title: To Blog or Not to Blog
item.description: Writing a blog can be daunting and scary for anyone. The thought of criticism and humiliation crosses your mind. What convinced me to write a blog and why do I recommend it to others?
